SELECT t3.authority FROM sys_user_role t1 LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu t2 ON t1.role_id = t2.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu t3 ON t2.menu_id = t3.id WHERE t1.user_id = #{userId} AND t1.deleted = 0 AND t2.deleted = 0 AND t3.deleted = 0 ORDER BY t3.sort
